ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Failed to get host address from ServerCache
ygData.msgSnippet: If you try that as the only seed, do you get this error? What else appears in the logs? Before the http://www.adp.com URI is fetched, a DNS URI for the same

If you try that as the only seed, do you get this error? What else
appears in the logs?

Before the 'http://www.adp.com' URI is fetched, a DNS URI for the
same host should be scheduled, and either succeed or fail. If
it fails, all HTTP URIs that wouldn depend on it will also fail,
in the PreconditionEnforcer processor stage.

Did you remove the PreconditionEnforcer from the processing chains?

- Gordon @ IA
